SEARCH
Package ie.atu.sw

Class IndexSetup

java.lang.Object
ie.atu.sw.IndexSetup
All Implemented Interfaces:
Indexer, Parser, ProgressBar
Direct Known Subclasses:
AlternateIndexBuilder, IndexBuilder
public abstract class IndexSetup extends Object implements Indexer, Parser, ProgressBar
The class IndexSetup is an abstract class that contains instance variable setter methods for any class extending it and acts as a superclass for that class. A subclass of this class must implement its abstract methods. The instance variables are defined as protected and therefore are visible and usable by a subclass of this class. Implements Indexer, Parser and ProgressBar.
Since:
Java 19.
See Also:

    • removeNullDefinition

      public abstract void removeNullDefinition()
      Remove any words in the index with a null definition. Words that had no definition in the dictionary file processed.
